summary: At an elite private boarding school, four students form a clique to sneak out of school after hours, to meet, drink and play. Trying to escape the golden cage, which their wealthy parents ... See full summary »
cast: Franz Dinda|Niklas Kohrt|Janusz Kocaj|Michael Ginsburg|Michael Schweighöfer|Stephanie Schönfeld|Kerstin De Ahna
title: Teenage Angst
